Component, GenericStateModel
public abstract class ConfiguratorBase
extends ComponentSupport

This component is a base class for ComponentInitializerService override implementations.

protected abstract ComponentDescription[] overrideComponentDescriptions(java.lang.String agentName,
                                                                        java.lang.String insertionPoint,
                                                                        ComponentDescription[] components)
Define this method to override each agent's configuration.

Returns:
a new list of components, or the passed-in components for no override.
